page.title: 09OUR SCHOOL-SWIMMING
page.content: Every week we go to Liskeard by coach for{swimming lessons.}When we are changed we go into the swimming pool and sit on the bench.There are three groups in the swimming pool.We have half an hour in the pool.We do things like back stroke,breast stroke,hand stands,sitting on the bottom,going under the water and touching the bottom.Sometimes we get to do swimming badges when we swim as many lengths as we can.We also do life-saving,when we wear pyjamas and swim in them.It's very hard because they slip down and come off.We have to dive down to the bottom and pick them up.Our parents pay 50p a week for each child to go, (Â£1 maximum) and the P.F.T.A. pay the rest. The County pays for the hire of the pool.
